name: Darkened Glory
description:
Darkened Glory will test your skills in a high paced, real-time fighting arena game. Play by yourself or join up with more players.

Choose your combatant, whether a mage or a simple warrior, you will start with a small purse of gold that is enough to begin your quest for darkened glory.

Be aware that this is an early access and we have 5 classes (with 2 sexes each) provided and 1 class upcoming.

Currently available classes:
-Warrior
-Berserker
-Mage
-Rogue
-Necromancer

We want to express our gratitude to MatyGex for helping us with Steam page setup!
